tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    amount DECIMAL,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    is_fraud BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    amount DECIMAL,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    is_fraud BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR,
    email VARCHAR,
    registration_date TIMESTAMP,
    is_blocked BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE flagged_transactions (
    flag_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_id INT,
    flag_reason VARCHAR,
    flag_date TIMESTAMP,
    is_resolved BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE transaction_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_id INT,
    log_date TIMESTAMP,
    log_message VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE fraud_detection_stats (
    stat_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    stat_date TIMESTAMP,
    total_transactions INT,
    total_flagged_transactions INT,
    fraud_percentage DECIMAL
)
